publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4517 Maureen Macmillan: Congratulations to the Highland Carers Project—That the Parliament congratulates the Highland Carers’ Project on the exhibition of photographs of Highland Carers, by Fin Macrae, on display in the Garden Lobby during Carers’ Week 2006 which takes place from 12 to 18 June; commends Fin for his fine work which celebrates carers as real people, young and old, with lives of their own alongside their caring roles, and urges all who can to study the exhibition and contemplate the contribution carers make to our society.

S2M-4517 Maureen Macmillan: Congratulations to the Highland Carers Project—That the Parliament congratulates the Highland Carers’ Project on the exhibition of photographs of Highland Carers, by Fin Macrae, on display in the Garden Lobby during Carers’ Week 2006 which takes place from 12 to 18 June; commends Fin for his fine work which celebrates carers as real people, young and old, with lives of their own alongside their caring roles, and urges all who can to study the exhibition and contemplate the contribution carers make to our society.
S2M-4517 Congratulations to the Highland Carers Project (lodged on 7 June 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4517 Congratulations to the Highland Carers Project (lodged on 7 June 2006) Rob Gibson*, Fergus Ewing*, Christine May*, Mr John Swinney*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Ms Sandra White*, Richard Lochhead*, Sarah Boyack*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Jamie Stone*

S2M-4517 Congratulations to the Highland Carers Project (lodged on 7 June 2006) Mr David Davidson*, Chris Ballance*, Robin Harper*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Jackie Baillie*, Trish Godman*, Eleanor Scott*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Marlyn Glen*, Dave Petrie*
S2M-4517 Congratulations to the Highland Carers Project (lodged on 7 June 2006) Marilyn Livingstone*
S2M-4517 Congratulations to the Highland Carers Project (lodged on 7 June 2006) John Swinburne*
S2M-4517 Congratulations to the Highland Carers Project (lodged on 7 June 2006) Cathy Peattie*
